title: Patch Management Implementation for Microsoft Exchange and Critical Infrastructure
objective: To establish and enforce patch management policies that ensure timely application of patches for Microsoft Exchange servers and other critical infrastructure to mitigate vulnerabilities and security risks.
timeline_phases: Phase 2: Development of Patch Management Policies
Phase 3: Deployment of Patch Management Framework
kpis: Percentage of patches applied within recommended timelines
User awareness levels on patch management best practices
risks: Inadequate training leading to improper patch application
Resistance to policy changes from IT staff
Delay in vendor updates or patches availability
Risk of new vulnerabilities emerging during the process
